about.title: About me
about.intro: I am a serious and determined 23-year-old student, currently pursuing a Master's in Physics. My laboratory internship in 2024 allowed me to develop rigorous research methodology and great autonomy. Building on this experience, I am seeking new opportunities to deepen my knowledge.
about.goalsText: Open to PhD opportunities in fundamental physics or data science positions in industry. I aim to apply my analytical skills and scientific rigor to innovative projects.

master.title: Master's in Fundamental Physics and Applications - Universe & Particles specialisation

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis - L3
dataAnalysis.description: Presentation of raw data filtering process applied to HL-LHC simulated data to estimate the presence of an 'X boson'.

collectivePhenomena.title: Collective Phenomena - M1
collectivePhenomena.description: Study of the Ising model with Python code implementation simulating the two-dimensional case.

quantumMechanics.title: Quantum Mechanics - M1
quantumMechanics.description: Introduction to quantum computing and its application to cryptography. Python simulation of Shor's quantum algorithm using the Cirq library.

arduino.title: Arduino Project - M1
arduino.description: Creation of a weather station composed of multiple sensors and a display to visualize data.

labview.title: LabVIEW Project - M1
labview.description: Development of a LabVIEW environment to control a muon detector with graphical data analysis.

particlePhysics.title: Particle Physics - M1
particlePhysics.description: Data acquisition via muon detector and analysis with ROOT to determine muon lifetime.

homeServer.title: Proxmox Home Server
homeServer.description: Proxmox server configuration with TrueNAS VM to create a secure family cloud. Storage management, automatic backup, and remote access.

homeAutomation.title: Home Assistant Automation
homeAutomation.description: Home automation system based on Home Assistant to control IoT devices and automate daily tasks. Integration of sensors, smart lighting, and custom automations.

internshipProject.title: Master 1 Internship — LPCA (LHCb Team)
internshipProject.description: Study of a rare B meson decay mode. Development of data analysis scripts with ROOT for LHCb Run I.

internshipProjectM2.title: Master 2 Internship — LPCA (ATLAS Team)
internshipProjectM2.description: Generation and analysis of simulated events to assess the feasibility of long-lived particle (LLP) searches at the HL-LHC. Production of HAHM scenarios (ggH and VH modes) and optimization of signal-to-background ratio. Characterization of LLP signatures and estimation of ATLAS detector acceptance.
